name: SOLECTRUS
description: SOLECTRUS is a photovoltaic dashboard that visualizes solar energy production, consumption, and battery storage data. It runs as a Docker-based stack with InfluxDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis, providing real-time monitoring and historical analysis of your solar power system.

notes.text: Credentials are stored in `~/solectrus.creds` inside the container.
Requires a data source such as Home Assistant or ioBroker to feed solar data into InfluxDB.
